Class SectorUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.digijava.module.aim.util.SectorUtil

extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for persisting all Sector with Scheme related entities

      • getAmpSectorsAndSubSectors

        public static java.util.List<AmpSector> getAmpSectorsAndSubSectors(java.lang.String configurationName)
        Returns:
        List of sectors and sub-sectors ordered by sectors alphabetically and then by sub-sectors alphabetically (Ex. A, a1, a2, a3, B, b1, b2, etc...). The names of the sectors are a embelished (upper case, or added some spaces) for better presentation. DO NOT save this objects back to the database !!!!
